original_title: Έμμονες Ώρες στον Τόπο της Πραγματικότητας
overview: An intimate confession of the Greek feminist avant-garde director Antoinetta Angelidi to her daughter Rea Walldén, and the world. A film on her gaze and life, her visions and films, and the devastating experience of going blind. A film made during lockdown inside a flat, about our interior space, at the most secret place of which one finds the Other.
title: Obsessive Hours at the Topos of Reality
